/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving the viewer a sense of looking up at the towering trees and the clear blue sky above. The trees, devoid of leaves, stand tall and straight, their branches reaching out towards the sky. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow on the scene. The street itself is empty, adding to the tranquility of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
